sources.name: Preston Motorcycle Club (VIC) - Website

sources.name: Computime - Calendar (VIC club road race entries/events)

sources.name: Historic Motorcycle Racing Association Victoria (HMRAV) - Events page
sources.notes: Lists upcoming historic events (road race + some hillclimb). Apply exclude_keywords.
